title: Moroccan lamb and lentil stew
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon plain flour', '1 large lamb chump chop; meat diced, bone reserved', 'oil for frying', '1 onion, chopped', '6 garlic cloves, minced', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/4 teaspoon turmeric', '6 cloves', '1 bay leaf', '4 carrots, sliced into large chunks', '250g lentils, rinsed and well drained', '100g pearl barley', '40g raisins', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 l beef stock', '2 potatoes, peeled and diced']
